website_summaries.verdict: Professional grade eight-cup silicone cupping set consisting of various sizes.
pros: Cups can be used for both static and gliding massage
Clear for good visibility of tissue
Simple to apply, with no pump to worry about
The manufacturer offers videos & tutorials on their website, with instructions and a lifetime warranty
cons: A few purchasers claimed the cups are too stiff and therefore do not provide enough suction

customer_reviews.title: ... doing about 2-8 sessions a week and have had excellent results on clients
customer_reviews.text: I got certified in cupping last oct through the ICTA and have been doing about 2-8 sessions a week and have had excellent results on clients. It's by far my favorite modality now. I've been getting more and more clients interested in it so this is my 3rd set of these cups. I also have a set of four large silicone cups from this company and two 40 pump cup sets from Karea, a small Haci set , and a biomagnetic/acupressure set. The silicone cups are very versatile and great for rounded areas like legs. CUP ON!
customer_reviews.author: eli

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I love the grip; it makes it super easy to use. I keep them near the shower and use them when I get out. The instructions were very helpful. I love these. The lumpy, bumpy underlying tissue on my thighs are finally starting to smooth out. These are great for trigger points. LOVE, LOVE, LOVE
customer_reviews.author: Ramona Smith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Work exactly as they should. Even the small size has good suction. I read some comments saying that they are stiff and hard to use but did not find that to be the case. If you are looking for a more intense suction, it's easiest to indent the top of the cup before placing and then release your grip on the cup once it's on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: ... a Sports Massage Therapist this is one of the best silicone cupping sets I’ve owned and used
customer_reviews.text: As a Sports Massage Therapist this is one of the best silicone cupping sets I’ve owned and used. I enjoy using these in my practice as well as at home. They are strong, durable, easy to use, and are an effective way to treat my athletes and marines for fascial adhesions. I even use them on myself! Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, nice cup size combinations
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and nice combination of cup sizes. Other brands only give you half the cups, and I find myself needing certain sizes more than the two largest ones. So, this set is perfect. Quality is as good as others that are twice as expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Susnm

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! As a massage therapist they form in my hand well My favorite one is the medium one! The package was a tad small I never could get them back in the plastic bag. But that was not a big deal at all!
customer_reviews.author: Tifni114

customer_reviews.title: Liberating !!!
customer_reviews.text: These are so much easier to use as inverse massage tools than the silicone ones that look like dome like cups. These are baguanfa(?) tools. Totally unique cupping tools. They feel so good and I think would last for a lifetime. I finally have a way to easily work out all the tightness in my thin arms. The concise videos show how. I think I have found the fountain of youth in these cupping tools and now I have ones specifically able to address targeted tissues with issues. Think of the myofascial system as an aquatic world that can be "frozen" for years but can also thaw . These tools will do that.
customer_reviews.author: Mylene

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Really great set, works just like the ones my physical therapists use but I get to do it at home. It's relaxing and definitely cheaper than professionals. I do love having other people work on me, but to be able to do this whenever I need it without leaving home is great.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: The ONLY option for Silicone cupping
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome. I purchased this probably 6 years ago and then recently tried to purchase more from a different seller; BIG MISTAKE. They had no suction and I had to return, just awful. Thankfully Amazon logs orders even from many years ago. So I re-ordered because I need more of the smaller cups. 5 stars always.
customer_reviews.author: Self

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT, CANT STOP USING
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!! I can now treat myself, and as a massage therapist, I NEED THE WORK! YAY! Great for moving the cups or leaving them in place.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa V.

customer_reviews.title: Big changes
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS SET. I wish there was options of a few more cups in a set. some of the bigger sizes. But these cups work great. Great add for a massage therapists practice thats super reasonable priced.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are so easy to use and I love how they contour to the body. I'll be using these a lot in my massage business
customer_reviews.author: Tangledmess

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these and started using right away for extremely tight IT bands in both legs and they have been helping loosen everything up.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love these for home use! Works as expected. Quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value,quantity and quality !
customer_reviews.text: Love these cupping cups ! This was the best value and number quantity that I could find online . I have had my set for five months . I have used them many times in a hot sauna and they are holding up well .clean up easily .
customer_reviews.author: happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The product is great quality and a good value. Follow up customer service is outstanding!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Bontrager

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These cups are wonderful! I love the various sizes. I bought a second set and am considering two more: one more for my massage practice and one for my home!
customer_reviews.author: vjbrown

customer_reviews.title: Great results in myofascial release
customer_reviews.text: Use these very often as moving cupping therapy. Bit stiff but soften over time. Great results in myofascial release.
customer_reviews.author: jjjhhh

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to use them yet but I have a co worker who loves his. They arrived fast and are as described.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Excited about my purchase
customer_reviews.text: They are just what I had been wanting. I’m not a practitioner, just got them to support my massage therapist’s work. Really excited!
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Guerrieri

customer_reviews.title: I’ve only used it on my shoulder and knees and it has made a difference and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So far it has worked as expected. I’ve only used it on my shoulder and knees and it has made a difference and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Nikolas Libson

customer_reviews.title: Cool cups!!!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool that I can now do cupping at home and not have to bother my massage therapist if Im having an issue with something. Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sara S. Mider

customer_reviews.title: Great cups and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I am a Massage Therapist and have been professionally trained and use the cups on almost every client. I have begun applying cupping cupping after I do Rock Blade work. My clients love the way they feel and recommend my services every time they speak with friends in pain. Thank you for adding to my business services and increasing my cup collection. I have the colored ones and enjoy the clear ones much better as I can see the skin much more clearly which helps me see what is happening with the clients skin. Thank you again. Sincerely, Sheila Clifford, BAS, LMT
customer_reviews.author: LMTinNH

customer_reviews.title: Great deal! Great massage cups!
customer_reviews.text: They seems to be the same as the high priced ones. I compared them to my fellow therapist in the fancy package and they are identical. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Gayla C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality, and I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sjstubbe

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier, these cups are wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier, these cups are wonderful, very effective. They work magic for my back pain. Great material and easy to store since they are four different sizes. One cup fits inside the other and so on.
customer_reviews.author: Espe

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE. EADY TO USE.
customer_reviews.text: Love these cups! The larger cups are difficult to place with full suction using one hand so best to have some help with placement. These give great suction with great results.
customer_reviews.author: T. H.

customer_reviews.title: great! i use mostly the small and the next ...
customer_reviews.text: great! i use mostly the small and the next bigger size, the others are too big and harder to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value, work well.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Well made, work well, easy to clean, easy to use, arrived in a timely fashion. Love that they are so easy to travel with because the stack.
customer_reviews.author: Moksha

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the ease of use on these cups
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the ease of use on these cups. I'm pleased with the relief and results from them. Be sure to get a book on proper cupping usage too.
customer_reviews.author: M.Smith

customer_reviews.title: These are great; easy to use & good quality silicone
customer_reviews.text: These are great; easy to use & good quality silicone. I bought the 8 pack and love the versatility using the different sizes. A great deal
customer_reviews.author: joyce a fishel

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: So..,normally I prefer the glass cups overall but they do have their disadvantages. These are the second type of silicone cups I've used. They work about the same though these seem to have the ability for a tighter seal. They definitely take practice, but once you get it down its pretty easy to incorporate them.
customer_reviews.author: bella bee

customer_reviews.title: ... done to me by a professional and I would like to continue at home
customer_reviews.text: I am new to the cupping craze It was first done to me by a professional and I would like to continue at home. These products are great. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Easy to use and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: lynnski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality cups! Just like the ones my massage therapist uses. Easy to apply to skin and super affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good quality cup
customer_reviews.text: Good quality cup, easy to use and great customer service!! Highly recommend! I am a massage therapist and my clients love these cups!
customer_reviews.author: Candace Cashmore

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the heavy-duty quality of the cups. After receiving the email AFTER delivery on how best to use the cups, I almost sent them back, but decided to try them out and found them durable, not too hard to squeeze, and they get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great suction
customer_reviews.text: I tried several types of cups and these are my favorite for suction. Follow the directions and it is great. I got the other style for active cupping, and these I leave on trouble spots for a longer time. You can buy these for less than the cost of a cupping session, so why not own your own?
customer_reviews.author: Moriah C.

customer_reviews.title: Love these cups
customer_reviews.text: Love these cups! Easy to use and just great. I put them on my child's back and they cured her cough in a day!
customer_reviews.author: healthymomshopper

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I really like these cups. I think I still need to break them in a little because the suction isn't that great yet. It takes a few tries to get the suction I want. The variety of sizes is nice and allows me to use them on various parts of my body with ease.
customer_reviews.author: AO

customer_reviews.title: Love these cups
customer_reviews.text: Love these cups. I bought the cupping sets from this seller twice now. They are easy to use and the price are very reasonable. I will buy more for my family as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya H.

customer_reviews.title: These work great! Make sure you know what you are doing before using them.
customer_reviews.text: I am a licensed massage therapist and I am a very big fan of cupping. The benifits are great and I use these regularly to maintain my own body! However, i urge anybody to get trained before you go into it because you can cause some damage such as blistering if you leave them on too long. Also, aftercare is super important so you need to know what to expect and how to care for your body after cupping.
customer_reviews.author: Ryiah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I am a professional massage therapist, and I am trained in cupping and this is exactly what I was looking for. The suction is fantastic and they are really easy to use. If you are trained in cupping and looking for good quality cups to use in your private practice, this is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Karisa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for flatter areas
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed using this set of cups. They were easy to use and I am sure I will get better as I use them move. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Sunflower

customer_reviews.title: These are very nice, but I'm a massage therapists
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice, but I'm a massage therapists, and the edges have a slightly raised edge (from the molds) that was a little scratchy and restricted the glide.
customer_reviews.author: r

customer_reviews.title: Great for the whole body
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd purchase of these cups. They are long lasting. I bought more because I have been giving them to my family to use. I am a PT and have been using cupping for my patient's for over 4 years but have started to do more in the last several months and what a HUGE difference. I work with the geriatric population and have seen a remarkable improvement in their posture and overall ability to move. Best product I have used!
customer_reviews.author: GSD owner

customer_reviews.title: Try it you'll like it.
customer_reviews.text: If you keep the cups stationary they have very good suction power, but still difficult to use (sliding) on very hairy people.
customer_reviews.author: Keith T. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Great price, work great
customer_reviews.text: Love these cups, bought two sets for the office and as massage therapists we use them all the time. Great price!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Hoerner

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: These suction cups are great for gliding or just to leave in one spot. Definitely help relieve pain!! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kaneshia P.

customer_reviews.title: Good set of sizes
customer_reviews.text: Not as thick as previous cups I've purchased so they are easier to squeeze.
customer_reviews.author: julie a frear

customer_reviews.title: Rough edges are painful
customer_reviews.text: These would be great except the edges that make contact with the skin are not finished well causing discomfort to the skin. With these, I learned, that all cups aren’t equal and you get what you pay for. Even while gliding people complain that it feels as if it’s cutting into them and is not pleasurable. During a stagnant usage it even creates a deep line that looks close to a cut, and a temporary but painful stinging/burning sensation at site where cup was latched to skin. Other brands I’ve used did not have this effect. Love cupping but these bring pain into it which isn’t supposed to be there.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbibrie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and affordable...
customer_reviews.text: A great set of massage cups. My clients love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Adams

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: All the cups are great. But I did find one that was significantly thinner and weaker than the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ayres

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to use oil on your skin 1st. The harder you squeeze the more the suction. Wish there was 1 size smaller. I put 2 on my shoulder and left them for just 5 minutes and my muscle relaxed. Unfortunately I also have a hickey! Oh well. Only used today for 1st time hopefully with regular use i will get some relief.
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: good quality - good value
customer_reviews.text: these work great - i am a licensed massage therapist and use them often.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence F Rockwell

customer_reviews.title: Great cups!
customer_reviews.text: I use both the hard plastic with pump type cups and these Silicone Cups. I have to say these are my favorite for active cupping sessions. They provide great vacuum and great gripping area for my hands to lift and move them while in use. Bravo!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen P.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I use thisbin my massage therapy practice. My clients love it.
customer_reviews.author: ANTOINE T OLIVER

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these cups! My massage therapist uses these and they work wonders so got a set for at home.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Good suction
customer_reviews.text: I just pump a little Jergens ultra lotion on my calves (that's where I use them) and put these on and move them around and you get a great myofascial massage. Wipe off the extra lotion with a paper towel. Also, you may want to check out what serrapeptidase and nattokinase could do to help you remodel your myofascial tissue if you are in need of using these cups. These cups come with a nice instruction manual.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and strong suction
customer_reviews.text: Bought for both personal use and for using on my massage clients. Happy with the purchase. They work well.
customer_reviews.author: green girl

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because they looked like the same cups we use at my work. I love these for working out tension and for pain relief. I was slightly wary of the price but these are high quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: Love the variety of sizes. Do feel like the silicone is a little thick and worry about comfort of the thicker lip during cup movement.
customer_reviews.author: Lizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These cups are great. The silicone is malleable, which many are not when they haven’t ever been used. I like that this set comes with 2x of the 4 sizes, which is often required for classes and easy to use during sessions for mirroring. Excellent value. The only thing I would complain about is that they don’t come with a carrying case or something of the like. I am using a plastic container currently.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great sets works perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great deAl and cup set, works great ! Will buy more
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah McKay

customer_reviews.title: Addicted to cupping.
customer_reviews.text: Just got into cupping therapy and these are awesome for gliding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: A colleague used these on me and I couldn't get home fast enough to order a set of my own. These have proved to be popular among family and clients and work especially well around sore knees. A 'must have' in any massage therapist's bag of tricks. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Grum

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Set
customer_reviews.text: They came quickly and at a good price but the product itself could be a little more supple. They are slightly hard to suction. They are a little hard on the thumbs but I am hoping with more use they will soften up.
customer_reviews.author: BEVERLY VELASQUEZ

customer_reviews.title: Great quality massage cups
customer_reviews.text: I liked the quality of the massage cups as well as the email sent with more information on using the cups.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth G

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly fine without the fire and alcohol hassle you can even do it yourself
customer_reviews.author: manu m

customer_reviews.title: These suck!
customer_reviews.text: These work great, they are a little more painful to put on, but if you like a lot of suction, I highly recommend. If you want a little more control over the suction, I recommend getting the other kind. They do work great for cupping massage too, where as the other type (hard plastic) is harder to do.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Easy to clean. They have worked wonders on my sore neck and have aided in my foot rehabilitation
customer_reviews.author: Emily Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and videos
customer_reviews.text: The cups are easy to apply and I don't have to use a pressure "gun". They also are very easy to clean. I am a Physical Therapist and use them on some of my patients.
customer_reviews.author: doug comer

customer_reviews.title: I love these cups
customer_reviews.text: I am a Licensed Massage Therapist. I love these cups!! I now have 4 sets 2 for my massage office and 2 for home. I use a cupping machine as well but these cups do just as well. They are easy to use and pack a punch when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Leisa B

customer_reviews.title: Bargain cupping set
customer_reviews.text: These cups were a great value. They function as expected and are holding out well over the past few months of regular use. The sizes can accommodate all areas of the body and work well for both static and dynamic cupping.
customer_reviews.author: Nonagon

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: No matter how hard I squeeze, I cannot get these cups to adhere to my body. The silicone walls are too thick or something to get a suction going. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Molly G Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for use in my massage practice. They are very easy to use, and are good quality. I’m very happy with my purchase, and so are my clients!
customer_reviews.author: megan mccullough

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am a LMT and love these cups. Stiff and first but the more I use they will get even better.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sliding!
customer_reviews.text: Slides easily, however they seem to be difficult to get the cups to suction right away and take a little bit of maneuvering. The more I use them, the easier they are to release air while compressing, but overall I am satisfied with them!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Foytik

customer_reviews.title: Thicker is better
customer_reviews.text: I thought the product is good but noticed that the silicone was not as thick as other cups I’d ordered form other companies. The thinner silicone does not have as much suction as the thicker ones.
customer_reviews.author: June Rettinger

customer_reviews.title: Try these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these cups, great suction and easy to clean and use. I've used a different brand of blue silicone cups and they are very flimsy compared to these.
customer_reviews.author: Sin Ironheart

customer_reviews.title: Good value for people who are used to this type of cups
customer_reviews.text: A lot of cups with different sizes. Good quality. I use it for myself and a little hard to apply. (Pushing down the top part of the cup while pulling the edge of the bottom of the cup)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I had a very good experience so I decided to buy it and use ...
customer_reviews.text: I did massage and the lady used this item on my back. I had a very good experience so I decided to buy it and use it myself. Quality item. Work perfect and I’m going to use it many times. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Refael

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good quality effective cups to break up fascia and increase circulation to the tissues
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: A gift for my daughter in law
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter in law. She is a massage therapist. She had one set and wanted more. I bought her 2 more sets. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Patzer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I had get some Accucups from massage warehouse that I felt in love with, using in my practice as a massage therapist. These were the same quality and I'm happy with them
customer_reviews.author: fatima apontes

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Just like the ones I used in class and paid 56$ for 8....color is clear no cloudiness and suction is just as good as my others.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Morehead

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I am a massage therapist and my clients love these cups. They are very durable and easy to use, and to clean. I’m very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hourhanz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good items. Would be better if I knew how to cup better :3
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: My therapist recommended these to use between visits
customer_reviews.text: My therapist recommended these to use between visits. Love it! The cups really help relieve the pain in my hips and legs. Plus the cellulte is disappearing!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Jones

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, effective
customer_reviews.text: I've just started using cupping in my physical therapy practice and within the first couple uses I've seen pain decreased in patients with various myofascial conditions! I've most used the gliding technique with oil on patients' skin. These cups are easy to clean in between uses as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bess

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I though.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic is very rigid. They do not suck enough blood to the affected area to be able to relief the lower back pain I suffer from. I would not recommend this item. Is too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Emily M. Drutel

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I like the 2 biggest cups the best. Wish there was a package deal for just the large ones that I use the most. I use them often at work as well as a set at home for myself
customer_reviews.author: Diana Moseman

customer_reviews.title: Immediate pain relief
customer_reviews.text: Use this on my husband’s tennis elbow, shoulder, lower back, legs, forearm it’s beyond amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My husband has constant shoulder pain due to an accident. He wanted me buy this set and we are both happy with it. I’ve even started doing it too. My husband isn’t complaint too much about pain. We try to do it atleast 2-3 times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Aliza

customer_reviews.title: My Personal Trainer Recommends These
customer_reviews.text: The cups are easy to wipe clean or wash. They're thick enough to be durable to use often.
customer_reviews.author: aloja

customer_reviews.title: Good silicone cups
customer_reviews.text: Bought a few sets, these seems to suction way better than the ones that are shaped different.
customer_reviews.author: J Chan

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased product to reduce cellulite on my legs. After 3 treatments I already see and feel a difference. Plan on using them for pain relief as well. Great product and suction!
customer_reviews.author: KLLP

customer_reviews.title: They're ok
customer_reviews.text: Suction it's soso... it's ok fit fascia but as far as getting the adhesions up to work out you'll need the cups with the gun over these
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: These cups are well made and work just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Beebalmoo10

customer_reviews.title: Save your money dont buy it
customer_reviews.text: It does not have enough suction power it's hard to put up regardless if you do it yourself or someone else setta it up for you. And when it is on the cup loses the suction my advice dont waste your on this just buy the traditional cupping system.
customer_reviews.author: manish sharma

product_meta.title: Cupping Warehouse Supreme 8 DEEP PRO 6065 Sturdy (4sizes) Cupping Therapy Sets Professional and Self Care Chinese Silicone Anti Cellulite Massage Suction Cups Joint, Pain, Muscles, Fascia, Lymphatic
product_meta.description:
The Cupping Warehouse Supreme Line of Cups have several different lines with different softness levels for varying cupping needs. Our Supreme Line of Cups each create different levels of suction. This is the Deep PRO 6065 Cups which are the original Cupping Warehouse Silicone cups designed for Healthcare Providers but also used by Self Care Home Users when needing a cup with the ability to provide super deep suction for slow deep tissue work. Our Deep PRO 6065 Cups provide one of the strongest suctions available in silicone cups, but to accomplish this, these cups have a a thick wall and a harder sturdy softness with our proprietary 6065 softness which requires more hand strength for maneuvering and creating suction but creates an unparalleled deep suction. These cups are preferred by Advanced Experienced Therapists performing Deep Massage Cupping, Sports Cupping, Rehabilitative cupping, Physical Therapy Cupping, Physiotherapy Cupping and used on patients/clients with stronger constitutions. Many Silicone Cup Manufacturers have similar appearances, but what matters most to therapists and self care users is the quality of the cup. Every user has different preferences. Know Your Cups! What style is right for you? Check out our Supreme Line of Cups 

*Supreme Deep Pro 6065 - Super Strong Suction, Sturdy Cup requires more Hand Manipulation. (Preferred by Advanced Experienced Therapists) 

*Supreme Intermediate Pro 5560 - Medium Suction, Softer Cup requires less hand manipulation and easy to maneuver. (Preferred by Therapists and Self Care Home Users)
feature_bullets: STURDY SILICONE CUPS: One of the strongest suction silicone cups on the market! Superior Proprietary engineered 6065 silicone with a Thicker Wall for deeper suction requires more hand manipulation but can create deeper suction and Ultra Clear View of Tissue. The Supreme Line has varying levels of softness: These are the harder Cups and we also have softer cups too. Know your cups!
YOUR CUPPING SET INCLUDES: SUPREME DEEP PRO 6065-2 X-Large (2.75”), 2 Large (2”), 2 Medium (1.5”) 2 Small (1.25”) cups made with High grade clear Silicone with enhanced tissue visibility.

MEETING AND EXCEEDING HIGH QUALITY SAFETY STANDARDS with Always clear, never colored cups for high visibility of tissue. NO Byproducts (BPA, Phthalates, Latex, PVC, Plastics). Deep PRO 6065 is the Advanced set in the Supreme Line Designed for extended use by Experienced Therapists.

Used By Professionals and Home Users for Cupping Therapy. (Chinese Medicine Doctors, Chiropractors, Osteopaths, Physical Therapists, Massage Therapists, Respiratory Therapists, Estheticians, Aestheticians and other licensed medical providers.)

TRUSTED international brand providing cups for professionals, spas, athletes, schools and more since 2013. Quality cups at an affordable price. No risks! Lifetime replacement guarantee! We proudly stand behind all of our products.
